Careers Programme <br/>
DESCRIPTION <br/>
Our Development Department is tasked is to create quality products, and products across a vast variety! <br/>

If you have the talent and passion for Developing, start your career in Exclusive Findings, with a great payment! Our Developers have no limit on their earnings, so if you can create many products, you get rewarded massively! <br/>

Developers could also be offered the chance to work on other matters behind the scenes, where extra payment will be rewarded! <br/>

Scripters 💻 <br/>

Weapon Creators 🔫 <br/>
Animators 🎞️ <br/>

Essentially, we are looking for every type of Developer! <br/>
If you have a skill that is not stated up there, just let us know what it is too!
TASKS & PAYMENTS <br/>
Product development must be done commonly, and we do minimally expect at least a product in a month. <br/>
<br/>
You will be paid per asset submitted to us, with no limits on your earnings! Furthermore, Senior Developers are able to qualify for R$, and USD percentage payments too! <br/>
